flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=80>>80 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*80 = <<40.0=40.0>>40.0 seashells
He was left with 80-40.0= <<80-40.0=40.0>>40.0 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
